name: Tiempo
author: tiempo

sections.description:
The best Spanish weather forecast widget plugin!

Tiempo3.com offers an accurate weather forecast for all cities around the world.
Just set the city and country and embed the widget in your website/blog.

  • Widgets are free of charge
  • Widget style can be customized
  • Responsive weather widget
  • No development skills are needed
  • High performance and lightweight code
  • SEO friendly – no iframes
  • Select your display language – Spanish/English
  • Block editor / Shortcode support / Classic Widgets / Legacy widgets

** For special customization requests please contact this mail -> contact@tiempo3.com

The Tiempo plugin is relying on a 3rd party as a service, the widget is using weather services provided by tiempo3.com.
* Service provider link – https://www.tiempo3.com
* Service provider terms of use link – https://www.tiempo3.com/terms
* Service privacy policy link – https://www.tiempo3.com/privacy

Easy Installation

There are several options for installation

Block Editor

  1. Open the Block Editor for the post or page where you want the widget.
  2. Add the “Tiempo Widget” block.
  3. Customize the widget settings as desired.

Shortcode

Insert [tiempo city="Madrid" country="Spain"] into your content, replacing CityName and CountryName with your location.

Classic Widgets

  1. Go to Appearance > Widgets.
  2. Add the “Tiempo Widget” to your sidebar.
  3. Configure the settings and save.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin from the WordPress repository or upload the plugin files to your /wp-content/plugins/tiempo directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Add the widget to your site using the Block Editor, a shortcode, or the Widgets screen.
sections.faq:
How much it cost?

The widget is free of charge, no small print.

Can I change the location?

Yes the location is being set dynamically when you add the widget

Can I change the background and font colors?

Yes, you can

I need special customization, can I talk with someone?

Yes send mail to contact@tiempo3.com, we are highly responsive.

Can I use this widget with the Block Editor?

Yes, the Tiempo Widget is fully compatible with the WordPress Block Editor.

How do I add the widget using a shortcode?

Simply use the shortcode format [tiempo city="CityName" country="CountryName"] in your posts or pages.

short_description: Spanish and English weather widget, 6 days weather forecast,
